data.title: Fraunces Tavern
data.meta_description: Fraunces Tavern | 40 followers on LinkedIn. Revolutionary Since 1776. | Welcome to Fraunces Tavern, New York's oldest and most historic bar and restaurant! Located at 54 Pearl Street, New York, NY, we proudly reside within a national landmark building. Join us to savor our rich heritage and enjoy an unparalleled dining experience.
data.text: We are delighted to say that Fraunces Tavern is now on LinkedIn! üéä If you have ever been to Fraunces Tavern and enjoyed your experience, we would appreciate your engagement through follows, likes, comments and shares to support the growth of our new page on this platform! We look forward to engaging with businesses and professionals on LinkedIn! The start of our LinkedIn Journey arrives just in time for the final stretch of planning for the holiday season üéÑ We cater to parties of all sizes but we do have limited availability remaining for 2023 so please get in touch as soon as possible if you are thinking of planning an event! üìç54 Pearl Street, New York, NY 10004 üìû(212) 968 1776 ‚úâÔ∏èinfo@frauncestavern.com
